title: trueherobtc
author: trueherobtc
content: To pay for your fathers surgery who he is really really ill I am willing to risk this 50k and invest it to triple to be able to save him. What would you save on this next bull run ? Much help would be highly highly appreciated !(I will updated you guys as how it goes)

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: I do not need to think about it too long if the money is to pay for my father's surgery, and I am willing to use it for him. I think we can make money some other time, and we have that opportunity. Instead of investing $50k in bitcoin, which we don't know when the price will increase, I will give that money to my father for his surgery. I can still try to invest in bitcoin next time, and I believe I can still do it.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: Enter this market with the money that you will not be upset when you lose. If you do not do this, you may face very sad situations... Use the money you have for the first installment of the surgery costs. And ask the bank for a loan for the remaining amount... Try going to countries that offer better health care at a cheaper price... Whatever you do, don't use the money you need in the crypto market. God help you.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: If the situation is in life and death and you've got money on hand, there's no need to look forward for the future if that money can save your loved one. No hesitations.I was once in a situation that I've got money ready to pay for buying a property and suddenly my kid was hospitalized and no double thinking I've made, I've spent the money for hospitalization despite it's for another property which will be an investment and this is no different of using it for buying crypto.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Let me give you more extreme tips. Since the next bull market phase is unpredictable and neither is your father's age, what if you bet 50k on casino games or sports betting. It will give faster results even on the same day. The assumption of this decision is that worrying about your father will not be saved until the bull market comes along and you turn out to be choosing a coin that is not following the trend.If you consider this immoral advice, then you can take a mirror for yourself.  Any financial advisor will not recommend that someone invest in critical health.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: That’s completely insane. You should not be putting those 50k in danger with any of the investment. There is no thing that can get your money tripled overnight. In this you will risk your money and could get into trouble with the whole medical services. You better visit nearest bank or relatives who can help you with the insurance or emergency medical services. I barely think anyone should be asking this question in the crypto where they want to make their investment triple and help for medical reasons. Just hope he will be alright.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: The market doesn't owe you anything, and with this approach to investing, you're more likely to lose your money. Look for other ways and avoid gambling and other projects that offer quick money. I do not see prospects for the growth of the crypto market now.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: 50k is a big amount there are many possible ways to triple it either in gambling, trading and investing but the risk were high. I get what you are saying, if you don't risk it you won't save your father's life. I honestly don't know what you can actually do and neither of us here are sure where's the market is going as of now so it would be very risk if you trade, in investment there's a lot of scam projects lately and there is no assurance that you would have a profit after you invest to ICO or IEO.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Do you know when the bull run came? while this is about the life of a human being who must be saved. Then you convince yourself to invest where no one really knows when a bull run will happen. What if you have lost money and the market is still bearish while your dad needs treatment?Did you pull the trigger to shoot yourself? and delaying the withdrawal because it is still a big loss?Risk-taking sounds ridiculous if you think about it. Think like an investor if you want to invest. But you are like a gambler who bets on human life.

comments.author: fenican
comments.body: Need more details. What country do you live in, what procedure, and what insurance options are available? In the USA health care insurance is guaranteed issue during enrollment periods regardless of how sick you are. If he is 65+ in the USA, should be able to apply for Medicare immediately. If he is destitute, with minimal income, he should be able to apply for Medicaid. In life or death situations in the USA, too, the hospital cannot deny you the care for financial reasons. They are required to stabilized the patient and bill them later.I also can't imagine any provider in the USA who wouldn't take $50k as a cash down payment and do the rest on a payment plan. Outside of the USA, I can't imagine a procedure costing more than $50k.

The risk of losing all those 50k usd is just way too high in my opinion. Also i think that you need to be really lucky at the moment to make a x3 of your investment because the whole crypto market is in bear mode.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Let me show this one quote:QuoteEmotional investmentInvesting based on emotion (greed or fear) is the main reason why so many people are buying at market tops and selling at market bottoms. Underestimating risks associated with investments is one reason why investors sometimes make suboptimal decisions based on emotion.You can read more hereIn short, forget about investing if you are clouded with emotion. It will not do you any good.  Spend the money where it should be and do an investment when you cleared your mind of any problems or worries.

Why don't people learn from that accident? if you put your money in this cryptocurrency market then you must think that all your money can reach zero, so you should never put money in this market that you cannot afford to lose, especially when it is money that is to be saved life of some of your relatives, don't be fooled by this market, having a 3X increase can be something that would take years, maybe 5 years, and your relative's health may not last those 5 years, you would risk putting money in this market of uncertainty? who guarantees you that every market could not go to zero? or who guarantees you that years from now you could have 3X profits? no one can give you that guarantee, so don't trust this market too much

What would you save on this next bull run ? There are two huge investment mistakes here:- Investing not free money, but money that is set aside for some need.- Increased financial expectations, resulting in higher risk and likely ill-considered decisions when investing or withdrawing.This behavior sounds more like a roulette game than investing. I do not advise anyone to do so, the outcome of such a scheme, with a probability of 95%, will be sad, partial or complete loss of the deposit.
